original_title: Total Corruption 2: One Night in Jail
overview: When two amorous park-goers are busted by a vice cop, one escapes and the other gets hauled to the Pokey for an 'in-depth' interrogation. During the night, he makes new and exciting friends with his bunkmates, and discovers they don't call it the 'Big House' for nothing. But when he goes head-to-head with a homophobic sergeant, they end up giving their 'billy clubs' a whole new kind of workout.
title: Total Corruption 2: One Night in Jail
